title: (Minister of State at the Department of Transport) (No. 2) Order 2023.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister of State at the Department of Transport) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department transport) (no 2) order 2023

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Transport) (No. 2) Order 2023.
heading: 2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Transport, is appointed as Special Adviser to Jack 
Chambers, Minister of State at the Department of Transport with effect from 1 
September 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 November, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [641] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,
